mapper.select: SELECT distinct tc.id, tc.name, tc.start_date startDate, tc.end_date endDate, tc.start_time startTime, tc.end_time endTime FROM teach_class_card_config tc, teach_ref_classcard_config trcc WHERE tc.del_flag=0 and tc.id=trcc.class_card_config_id and trcc.school_id=#{schoolId} order by tc.create_date desc

SELECT distinct tc.id, tc.name, tc.start_date startDate, tc.end_date endDate, tc.start_time startTime, tc.end_time endTime, tc.week FROM teach_class_card_config tc WHERE tc.del_flag=0 and tc.id = #{id}

SELECT distinct tc.id, tc.name, tc.start_date startDate, tc.end_date endDate, tc.start_time startTime, tc.end_time endTime FROM teach_class_card_config tc WHERE tc.del_flag=0 order by tc.create_date desc

SELECT id, screen_off_week screenOffWeek, screen_off_start_time screenOffStartTime, screen_off_end_time screenOffEndTime FROM teach_ref_classcard_config_screen_off trccso where class_card_config_id = #{classCardConfigId} and trccso.del_flag=0 ORDER BY trccso.screen_off_start_time;

SELECT distinct tc.id, tc.name, tc.start_date startDate, tc.end_date endDate, tc.start_time startTime, tc.end_time endTime FROM teach_class_card_config tc, teach_ref_classcard_config trcc WHERE tc.del_flag=0 and tc.id=trcc.class_card_config_id and tc.create_by=#{userId} order by tc.create_date desc
